doc:
Jason Brooks (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jason_Brooks_(actor) 0 Jason Maxwell Brooks (born May 10, 1966) is an American actor. He is best known for playing Peter Blake on the soap opera Days of Our Lives and Sean Monroe on Baywatch Hawaii. Jason also had a recurring guest appearance on the television show The Pretender, playing Thomas Gates. He played on The Suite Life of Zack Cody as Dakota Smith. He played Bacarra, a Warlock in episode 7, season 5 of Charmed. He also appeared in an episode of the NBC sitcom Friends as Rick in The One with the Ballroom Dancing in season 4. He voiced the protagonist, Ronan O'Connor, of the 2014 action-adventure video game, Murdered: Soul Suspect. Jason_Maxwell_Brooks ( born May_10_,_1966 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for playing Peter_Blake on the_soap_opera_Days of Our_Lives and Sean_Monroe on Baywatch_Hawaii . Jason also had a_recurring_guest_appearance on the_television_show The_Pretender , playing Thomas_Gates . He played on The_Suite_Life of Zack_ as Dakota_Smith . He played Bacarra , a_Warlock in episode_7 , season_5 of Charmed . He also appeared in an_episode of the_NBC_sitcom_Friends as Rick in The_One with the_Ballroom_Dancing in season_4 . He voiced the_protagonist , Ronan_O'Connor , of the_2014_action-adventure_video_game , Murdered : Soul_Suspect .
